item.title: yoli add a quote by Meg Wolitzer
item.description: "But, she knew, you didn’t have to marry your soulmate, and you didn’t even have to marry an Interesting. You didn’t always need to be the dazzler, the firecracker, the one who cracked everyone up, or made everyone want to sleep with you, or be the one who wrote and starred in the play that got the standing ovation. You could cease to be obsessed with the idea of being interesting." -- Meg Wolitzer

item.title: yoli add a quote by J.M. Coetzee
item.description: "Become major, Paul. Live like a hero. That's what the classics teach us. Be a main character. Otherwise what is life for?" -- J.M. Coetzee
